Risālah fī ʻilm al-mīqāt wa-al-falak
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tājūrī, Abū Zayd ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad , -1590
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red.
According to the colophon (f. 31r), copy completed on 12 Ṣafar 1045 AH [July 27, 1635 AD].
MS Arab 236. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

Bound with: Taʻlīq laṭīf ʻalá al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah / li-Muḥibb al-Dīn al-Buṣrawī. 1640 (ff. 1r-14v) ; al-Khazrajīyah / li-al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn al-Khazrajī. 1640 (ff. 15r-18v) ; al-Risālah al-thānīyah min rasāʼil al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Tājūrī (ff. 32r-39r) ; al-Majmūʻ fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ / al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-Rabbānī al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Kalāʼī. 1641 (ff. 39v-69r).
